alert.note: Alert for Calhoun; Coastal Bay; Coastal Gulf; Inland Bay; Inland Gulf (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 30 at 8:13PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A gust front followed by strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northern Gulf, southern Bay and southwestern Calhoun Counties in the Panhandle of Florida through 900 PM EDT/800 PM CDT/... At 812 PM EDT/712 PM CDT/, Doppler radar was tracking a gust front along a line extending from 8 miles northwest of Stonemill Creek to 8 miles northeast of Callaway to Panama City Beach. Movement was southeast at 30 mph. Strong thunderstorms follow behind the gust front. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Panama City, Lynn Haven, Panama City Beach, Callaway, Springfield, Mexico Beach, Hiland Park, Stonemill Creek, Tyndall Air Force Base, Parker, Wewahitchka, Honeyville, St Andrews State Park, Allanton, Cedar Grove, Chipola Cutoff, Dirego Park, Beacon Beach, College Station and Gulf Resort Beach. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Calhoun; Coastal Bay; Coastal Gulf; Inland Bay; Inland Gulf
